overview:
Flavie Bagnol is the VP of communications for Thrillist.com a leading menâ€™s lifestyle publication reaching over 2.5 million subscribers. Thrillist connects daily to young, well-educated, affluent guys in each of its 19 local markets across the U.S. and the U.K..

Bagnol oversees all aspects of communications outreach for Thrillist.com, recently acquired e-commerce menâ€™s flash sales site JackThreads.com and newly launched Thrillist Rewards.

Prior to working at Thrillist Bagnol was a national news producer for CBS News, The Early Show. Prior to joining the Early Show she was a lead producer for Network News Service (a CBS, ABC and Fox News consortium).

Bagnol is originally from France.
